message.content:
The most likely category for this paper would be "Toys & Games" because it is promoting a mobile game. 

The second likely category would be "Video Games" because it specifically mentions playing the game on the go. 

The third likely category would be "Electronics" because it is a digital game that can be played on various devices. 

The fourth likely category would be "Books" because it is promoting a game that has a storyline and can be considered a form of entertainment. 

The fifth likely category would be "Software" because it is promoting a digital game that can be downloaded and played on different platforms.

prompt:
Title: NA
Content: Get ready to soil your plants! Now you can zap zombies on the go in PopCap's award-winning game! Enjoy thrilling new minigames, take on a friend in Versus mode, and make your own zombie with the Zombatar! Plus, you'll get all the fun of the original hit game: Fight the fun-dead with your arsenal of plants through day, night, fog, in the swimming pool and on the roof. It's a powerful, portable new way to play Plants vs. Zombies. The fun never dies!...
Question: Which of the following category does this paper belong to: 1) Home & Kitchen, 2) Health & Personal Care, 3) Beauty, 4) Sports & Outdoors, 5) Books, 6) Patio, Lawn & Garden, 7) Toys & Games, 8) CDs & Vinyl, 9) Cell Phones & Accessories, 10) Grocery & Gourmet Food, 11) Arts, Crafts & Sewing, 12) Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry, 13) Electronics, 14) Movies & TV, 15) Software, 16) Video Games, 17) Automotive, 18) Pet Supplies, 19) Office Products, 20) Industrial & Scientific, 21) Musical Instruments, 22) Tools & Home Improvement, 23) Magazine Subscriptions, 24) Baby Products, 25) NAN, 26) Appliances, 27) Kitchen & Dining, 28) Collectibles & Fine Art, 29) All Beauty, 30) Luxury Beauty, 31) Amazon Fashion, 32) Computers, 33) All Electronics, 34) Purchase Circles, 35) MP3 Players & Accessories, 36) Gift Cards, 37) Office & School Supplies, 38) Home Improvement, 39) Camera & Photo, 40) GPS & Navigation, 41) Digital Music, 42) Car Electronics, 43) Baby, 44) Kindle Store, 45) Buy a Kindle, 46) Furniture & Décor, 47) #508510?
